item.title: HUK Men’s Next Level Quick-Drying Performance Fishing Shorts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Huk Next Level 10.5″ Short: Any day is a good day when you get to wear shorts. These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:26 UTC – Details)


The Huk Next Level 10.5″ Short: Any day is a good day when you get to wear shorts. These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has a ton of tech and performance built in them. Huk uses a lightweight, quick dry, UPF +30 stretch fabric gusseted crotch to keep your mobility at a premium. Rear yoke includes laser perforation to further enhance the quick dry / breathability of these shorts. Lastly, Huk added an adjustable waistband for a perfect fit. On the boat, dock or just hanging around town, these will make your day a little better and always have you at the ready to fish. At Huk, we unite all anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8 x 8 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ H2000011
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 24, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Huk
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07GSYZY98

Imported
Button closure
Machine Wash
Huk | Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish
NEXT LEVEL 10.5″ SHORT – This fishing short protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays and is quick drying ensuring all day comfort | 10.5″ length falls at the knee
TECHNICAL PERFORMANCE FISH SHORT – The Next Level incorporates perforated back yoke, zippered back pocket, plyer and cargo pockets and gusseted crotch for maximum mobility; you’ll never want to fish without this fully featured short again

4.5
Price: $32.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:26 UTC – Details)

From the brand

eRapta – Best Driving Partner

eRapta aims to improve our safety on the road.

Whether life or travel, our reversing camera is the car’s eye to secure your journey.

Backup Camera System Kit

High-Quality Backup Camera

Excellent license plate wired backup camera: designed for car,Pickup Truck,SUV,Minivan and Sedans. Work well on old cars,new cars or used cars.
Universal rear view camera:Suit for 12-24V DC Power. 26ft RCA video cable. It will work well if you radio,monitor,DVD player or screen has the RCA connector.
Crystal Clear Image Nice Night Vision: Pretty Clear Video,6 Glass Lens, 100% True Color Reproduction, 100% Updated Chip. Vivid Picture helps us to Drive or Reverse with a pleasant Mood. 8 LED lights do a great job to get a nice colorful image in the dark. Excellent parking camera for safe reversing and driving.
Easy to Install:Just need to connect camera’s power to reversing light,then connect the camera to your radio screen or monitor by 26ft RCA cable, Complete kits and easy installation save our time.
IP 69 Waterproof Level Reversing cam: Highly Waterproof backup camera kits. The camera is made by high-purity resin,with international standard IP69K waterproof.So you can use it daringly whatever it’s rainy/snowy/hot
Ideal Auto Backup camera:The camera can be adjusted up and down to find a angle you prefer, 149° Perfect View Angle Design, Rear License plate backing up camera design.
In the Box: 1x Camera, 1x AV cable ,1x Power cable ,1x Installation manual. eRapta support department will always be there for any consultation

LARGE DISPLAY — 6.6 inches large LED screen with large numbers make it very easy to read the time. You can also use our led clock as a mirror, its operation is very simple.
DUAL USB PORT — 2 USB charging ports can simultaneously charge two devices. SBackup battery (included) only stores time and alarms’ settings. Tips: This clock can only be used when powered by USB powered.
SNOOZE FUNCTION — Big snooze button helps you to easily turn off the buzzer without opening eyes, and get extra 5-60 minutes sleep. Is your essential artifact.
ADJUSTABLE BRIGHTNESS — The mirror digital clock provides 3-level brightness,adjust by manual or auto to a comfortable brightness. Very convenient to use.
NIGHT MODE — The quiet and silent clock allows you to get rid of the hustle and bustle of the night and fall asleep peacefully. At night the mirror alarm clock will automatically enter the lowest brightness state to prevent affecting your sleep quality.
